N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]
B = list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]
C = list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]

count = 0

for i in range(N - 1):
    for j in range(i + 1, N):
        count += A[i] * A[j]

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        ans += l[i] * l[j]


print(ans % (10**9+7))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))

    ans = 0
    for i in range(n-1):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            ans += l[i] * l[j]

    print(ans % (10**9+7))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

N = int(input())
